modName: Main Menu Music Replacer - Sons of Skyrim Remake on eight floppy drives
summary: A simple mod that replaces the main menu music with that of the music in the similarly named video.
descriptionHtml:
As was requested by a user in its comments section, this is aÂ simple mod that replaces the main menu music with that of the music in the similarly named video.
I made the mod, not the music/video.
